Description: Only 2 blocks to Wheelock Center! You¿ll love this BEAUTIFUL, upscale home! Craftsman 7 bedroom, 2 full baths/2 story & basement (2,700 sf). Lots of hardwoods, beautiful moldings, and coved ceilings. The dining room has hardwoods, an arts and crafts chandelier, built-in buffet with a leaded-glass window above, and a built-in window seat. The large living room features lots of windows, hardwood floors and stone fireplace flanked by leaded-glass bookcases. The kitchen includes all appliances and there is a sunroom/pantry which has a second refrigerator. The home is painted in decorator colors to reflect the charm of the Arts and Crafts era. Spacious front entry. Efficient forced-air gas furnace. A large deck completes the private, fenced backyard and the grounds are landscaped with lovely shrubs and trees. Laundry room includes washer and dryer. Large rooms! Some bedrooms are enormous! Well maintained. Very clean. Off-street parking and sprinkler system. May have 8th person for $100 more to reduce your costs. Available for viewing by appointment only. We take pride in our rentals and respond quickly to requests and concerns! Email for additional pictures. NS/NP Rents Quickly. This house is a knock-out!
